emfmodeldistance

Class ValueDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • emfmodeldistance.DistanceCalculator
      • emfmodeldistance.ValueDistance

  • public abstract class ValueDistance
extends DistanceCalculator
    This class calculates the value distance between two models M1 and M2. The value distance is the difference in attribute values between M1 and M2. We assume that any attribute type can be encoded as a double. Then the value distance of attribute x becomes |M2.x - M1.x| / M2.x. In this case, M2 acts as the expected target.
    Author:
    Eugene Syriani
